param.name: SessionClosing
param.label: Session Closing
param.description: Weather use Sesison closing or not. Select Auto for Automatic Session Cloings

param.name: SessionTimings
param.label: Session To at time
param.description: Time to run the session closing each day in 24 Hour pattern

param.name: MidSessionClosing
param.label: MidSession Closing
param.description: Weather use MID Sesison closing or not. Select Auto for Automatic Session Cloings

param.name: MainClosing
param.label: Main Closing
param.description: The Main Closings are On or not

param.name: UseSimulation
param.label: Use Simulation/Trimming
param.description: Weather you want to use simulation /trimming or not

param.name: ServiceCharges
param.label: Service Charges in %
param.description: Service Charges on Total Income to deduct on Payout(Main) Closing

param.name: TDSWithoutPAN
param.label: TDS without PAN %
param.description: TDS to deduct on payout if joinined without PAN no

param.name: TDSWithPAN
param.label: TDS with PAN %
param.description: TDS to deduct on payout if joinined with PAN no

param.name: MinIncomeForTDSDeduction
param.label: Start TDS Deducting after Rs
param.description: When to deduct TDS, minimum limit, Enter 0 to deduct TDS from start

param.name: UpgradationCharges
param.label: Upgradation Charges in %
param.description: Amount to deduct on each payout to upgrade the ID

param.name: UpgradationChargesTill
param.label: Total Amount to deduct
param.description: Total Amount to deduct from payout

param.name: UpgradeWhat
param.label: Upgrade What
param.description: What Point system to upgrade if all Chrges has been deducted

param.name: UpgradePointsWith
param.label: How Much Upgrade
param.description: How you want to increase your points selected above

param.name: FixedUpgradePoints
param.label: Fixed upgrade points
param.description: How much points you want to increase if it is from fixed type

param.name: UpgradeAnsesstors
param.label: Upgrade Ansesstors
param.description: Do this upgrading affacts Ansesstors

param.name: TDSon
param.label: Deduct TDS On
param.description: On which amount TDS should be deducted

param.name: MinReleasingAmount
param.label: Min Releasing Amount
param.description: Min Amount to be released

param.name: MinReleasingAmountBasedOn
param.label: Min Releasing Amount is
param.description: Total Income based or cheque writing based
param.option: After DEducting Service Charge and Other Deductions

param.name: AmountToDeductFromFirstPayout
param.label: Amount to Deduct From First Closing
param.description: Amount to deduct from first payout main closing

param.name: OtherDeduction
param.label: Other Deduction
param.description: Either Fixed or in Percentage, Percentage must be defined in terms of fractions like for 1 Percent type '1/100'

param.name: OtherDeductionRemark
param.label: Other Deduction Remark
param.description: Anything for other Deduction Remark
